entries.title: Jeremy Renner Accident Update: Everything You Need To Know About The Marvel Star’s Recovery
entries.description: Here's everything you need to know about the freak snow-plow accident that put actor and Marvel star Jeremy Renner into the ICU on New Year's Day in critical condition, and where he is now on his path to recovery.

entries.description: The new Dracula film stars two Nics—Nicolas Cage as the blood-sucking Count Dracula and Nicholas Hoult as his bug-eating manservant, Renfield.

entries.title: CES 2023: M. Night Shyamalan Releases Terrifying ‘Knock At The Cabin’ Immersive Trailer | Interview
entries.description: One of the biggest surprises at CES has been the appearance of film director, M. Night Shyamalan, who’s hotly-awaited apocalyptic thriller "Knock at the Cabin" premieres in theaters Feb 3. In this interview, he shares why he decided to create a CES experience with Canon that fans won't soon forget.

entries.title: CES 2023: Delta To Launch Free Wifi And Streaming At Scale. Does It Work?

entries.title: Tetraplegics Can Now Control Their Wheelchairs By Brain Waves Alone
entries.description: A completely non-invasive technology allows people who are paralyzed to control their wheelchairs simply by using their minds and a cap that decodes their brain waves.

entries.title: MLB The Show 23 Legends: Former Players You’ll Likely Never See In The Game
entries.description: Every year, the new or excluded legends of baseball are a topic of conversation among the MLB The Show community. Don't count on one small group of former players being added to the game.

entries.title: Appian CTO: Data Fabric Leads Evolution Of Low-Code For Process Automation

entries.title: Walgreens Has 200 VillageMD Clinics Attached To Stores As Doctor Network Takes Off

entries.title: Ailing, Leaderless Jaguar Land Rover Has Options, But None Look Tempting

Neither is very likely, so the quicker it picks a partner or succumbs to a takeover, the sooner it can breathe easy. Job one; replace former CEO Thierry Bollore.

entries.description:
Increasing access to clinical trials - for both patients as well as research sites - is critical as issues like clinical trial diversity, health equity and acceptance of RWD become more highly visible and important.

Crescendo Health aims to do that by providing technology to patients.

entries.title: Scientists Sequence The Genomes Of Endangered Sharks
